title: Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, 1 Pack Mini Battery Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights for Bedroom, Christmas, Parties, Wedding, Centerpiece, Decoration (5m/16ft Warm White)
descriptions:
### Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated

**Product Overview:**
- **Product Name:** Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated
- **Pack Size:** 1 pack
- **Power Source:** Battery Operated
- **Battery Requirements:** 3 AA Batteries (Not Included)
- **Light Type:** Mini Battery-Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights

**Key Features:**
- **Length:** 5m / 16ft
- **Color:** Warm White
- **LED Count:** 50
- **LED Size:** Rice grain size
- **Viewing Angle:** 360 degrees
- **Wire Material:** Copper
- **Wire Length:** 16 ft
- **Distance Between LEDs:** 4 inches
- **Cable Length to Battery Box:** 12 inches
- **Battery Box:** Clear and Small, Easy to Hide, Requires 3 AA Batteries (Not Included)
- **Energy Efficiency:** Yes
- **Heat Emission:** No heat problems
- **Waterproof:** Yes
- **Shapeable Wire:** Ultra-thin and bendable, easy to shape and mold
- **Sturdiness:** Durable and long-lasting

**Use Cases:**
- **Bedroom:** Create a cozy and relaxing atmosphere.
- **Christmas:** Add festive sparkle to your holiday decorations.
- **Parties:** Enhance the ambiance of any party or event.
- **Wedding:** Ideal for romantic and elegant wedding settings.
- **Centerpiece:** Perfect for table decorations.
- **Decoration:** Versatile for various decorative purposes.

**Additional Features:**
- **Bright Micro LEDS:** 50 LEDs ensure a bright and even light distribution.
- **No Heat Problems:** Safe to use without worrying about overheating.
- **Energy Efficient:** Low power consumption for extended battery life.
- **Customer Service:**
  - **Return Policy:** Returns accepted via Amazon.
  - **Contact:** Professional customer service team available for assistance.

**After-Sales Service:**
- **Contact Customer Service:** For any assistance or returns, contact our professional customer service team.
- **Return by Amazon:** Easy return process through Amazon.

**Why Choose Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights?**
- **Versatility:** Suitable for a wide range of settings and occasions.
- **Quality:** Made with high-quality materials for durability and performance.
- **Convenience:** Battery-operated and easy to install, no wiring needed.
- **Safety:** No heat emission and waterproof, ensuring safe use in various environments.

Enhance your space with the warm, inviting glow of Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated. Order yours today and enjoy the perfect touch of elegance and charm!
